headline: Does HP’s Sudden CEO Change and Reaffirmed Outlook Reshape the Bull Case For HP (HPQ)?
summary: HP Inc. recently announced that CEO Enrique Lores stepped down from his roles as President, chief executive, and board member on February 2, 2026, with director Bruce Broussard assuming the position of interim CEO and the board launching a formal search for a permanent successor while also amending its bylaws, effective February 3, 2026. Even as it manages this leadership transition and board reshuffle, HP reaffirmed its first-quarter and full-year 2026 earnings guidance and declared a...
